underarm.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if you throw a ball underarm, you throw it without moving your arm above your shoulder
underarm.translation[1].definitions[0].d: relating to or used on your armpits
underarm.translation[1].definitions[1].d: an underarm throw is one where you throw a ball without moving your arm above your shoulder
underarm.translation[2].definitions[0].d: the hollow area under your arm, where it joins your body
